title: Integrative Healing Enhancement - About Us - Service Areas
description: Mayo Clinic volunteer opportunities in integrative healing enhancement.
cleaned_text: Mayo Clinic offers appointments in Arizona, Florida and Minnesota and at Mayo Clinic Health System locations. Our goal is to do what we can to make patients as comfortable as possible. In conjunction with Mayo Clinic's Complementary and Integrative Medicine Program, these programs strive to enrich the patient experience and enhance healing while at Mayo Clinic. Enhance social interaction and provide companionship and comfort to hospitalized patients with specially trained and registered dogs. Volunteers must have their own registered therapy dog. Provide patients, caregivers and nursing staff a gentle, relaxing, nontherapeutic hand massage. Volunteers receive specific hand massage training. Perform reiki or healing touch for patients at both Mayo Clinic Hospital — Rochester campuses and some outpatient areas in partnership with the Complementary and Integrative Medicine Program. Make your tax-deductible gift and be a part of the cutting-edge research and care that's changing medicine.
